CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 16, 1953, pg. 33 reads: "May Fair - James Satterwhite and Edward Watson provided a comedy act to warm up the large crowd drawn to the Irene Kaufmann Settlement for the May Fair last week. Among the groups which participated in the evening of fun and frolic were the Curtaineers, Mothers of the Nursery School, Grandmothers Club, Gaytimers, the photography, woodshop and sewing classes and the Hill District Peoples Forum. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James Satterwhite and Edward Watson performing comedy act during May Fair at Irene Kaufmann Settlement
